6296.quoteText: We do not collect your IP address, which is a type of data that can identify you personally.
6296.title: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

tosdr.case: IP addresses of website visitors are not tracked

6297.quoteText: We do not partner with third parties to collect any information, nor do we share information with third parties, for any of the above.
6297.title: The service does not share user information with third parties

tosdr.case: The service does not share user information with third parties

6298.title: There is a date of the last update of the terms

tosdr.case: There is a date of the last update of the terms

6299.quoteText:
We always anonymise data that we use externally, even in the context of evaluation, research and reports.
Occasionally, internal data is not anonymised, however it is securely kept and used for a specific purpose, and only used for the amount of time that it is needed.
6299.title: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of users' data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period

tosdr.case: The service may keep a secure, anonymized record of users' data for analytical purposes even after the data retention period

6301.quoteText: In all of the above cases, the data is stored securely, and for a limited time period only.
6301.title: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time

tosdr.case: User logs are deleted after a finite period of time
